relationships.description: Interacts with and submits transactions to

softwareSystems.name: UTXO Lookup Service
softwareSystems.description: Provides an API to lookup the statuses of UTXOs

softwareSystems.name: TX/TXO Lookup Service
softwareSystems.description: Allows legacy lookup of transactions and transaction outputs

softwareSystems.name: TX|Subtree|Block request Multicast Group
softwareSystems.description: Requests missing TX, Subtree, or Block to be remulticasted

softwareSystems.name: Node Network (Teranode)
softwareSystems.description: Timestamps      transactions into Blocks, maintains UTXO set, and enforces the rules  of the Blockchain

relationships.description: Send Block Candidate to | Receive Proof-of-Work from

containers.name: BlockAssembly Service
containers.description: Responsible for assembling new blocks with transactions

Store Merkle Subtrees | <-Get new Merkle Subtrees
Send Block Candidate to | Receive Proof-of-Work from

containers.name: Propagation-TxValidation Message Broker
containers.description: Responsible for brokering transactions from Propagation Services to TX Validation Services

containers.name: Propagation Service
containers.description: Responsible for the propagation of transactions and blocks across the network

containers.name: TxValidation-BlockAssembly Message Broker
containers.description: Responsible for brokering TXIDs from the TX Validation Services to the Block Assembly Services

containers.name: Blockchain Service
containers.description: Handles operations related to the blockchain

relationships.description: Update Block Header Store | <-Get best Block Header
Validate against UTXO set | Update UTXO set

softwareSystems.name: Multicast Network
softwareSystems.description: Handles incoming transactions and subtrees for the Node network

softwareSystems.name: Banlist Service
softwareSystems.description: Maintains a dynamic banlist related to rejected TXs, Blocks, and Subtrees

softwareSystems.name: TX Submission Multicast Group
softwareSystems.description: Multicasts received extended transactions to the Node Network

containers.name: Propagation-TxValidation Message Broker
containers.description: Responsible for brokering transactions from Propagation Services to TX Validation Services

containers.name: Propagation Service
containers.description: Responsible for the propagation of transactions and blocks across the network

relationships.description: Update Block Header Store | <-Get best Block Header

softwareSystems.name: Block announcement Multicast Group
softwareSystems.description: Multicasts found Blocks to the Node Network

relationships.description: Receive extended TXs from | Send TXs to

softwareSystems.name: TX Submission Service (ARC)
softwareSystems.description: Submits transactions to the Node network via IPv6 multicast

softwareSystems.name: Merkle Subtree announcement Multicast Group
softwareSystems.description: Multicasts constructed Subtrees to the Node Network

softwareSystems.name: Coinbase Overlay Node
softwareSystems.description: Handles operations related to the coinbase transaction of a block
